attributes.action: arrange for Tony Blair to face trial for War Crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given Tony Blair's recent statement that he would have invaded Iraq even if there weren't WMD's, it is time that a trial is held in order to determine  if he is guilty of War Crimes.

The current enquiry will not determine if Tony Blair is either innocent or guilty of War Crimes.  Only a trial will establish the truth.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
